name: Nu Connect - Northumbria University
description: NU Connect  your on-the-go companion for various Northumbria resources and services.  Need to know your and how to get to your new class, find spare PCs and software, see what events are taking place on campus, and check whether a washing machine is available in your halls? Its all in this app!  Features:  Undergraduate Open Days:  Book up, find your way here and tour the campus. You can scroll through the lists of sessions and tasks and build up a personal schedule for your day.  My Learning:  Access your class and exam timetables, along with their times and locations. Access the various surveys which take place throughout the academic year. First years can now use Educational Analytics to view learning statistics and set personal goals.  Whats On:  Find out what is happening on campus. The latest addition is our Careers Events - find out whats involved and, if youre coming along, plan your day.  Students Union:  Find out more about your Students Union, including Freshers Week, Societies, Gigs, Academic Advice, and more.  Finder:  Search for available PCs and Macs across campus, and what software is available where. Scroll through the various food outlets on campus to see where they are and what they sell. View University accommodation and, with 360 room tours, you can find out more about each location. You can also connect and stay safe when on campus using Safezone  Maps:  Connect to City, Coach Lane, London and Amsterdam campus maps to find your way around. Tap the i icon to see building details, including opening hours.  Travel:  Find available car and bike parking across the campuses and see the timetable and stops for the free campus bus. Find information about accessibility and location information for disabled parking and routes onto campus.  Essential Info:  Access important information before you arrive at Northumbria, including a checklist of the enrolment actions you need to complete when you arrive at Northumbria, and the Student Conduct documentation and procedures.  My Profile:  See your core details, including email address, print credits, and notification settings.   Messages:  Access messages sent through the NU Connect app, from notices about events to Portal Enquiry replies.    NOTE: On login you must use studentid within the email and not name and email.  ie. student id a5243gd -> login email is used as follws: a5243gd@northumbria.ac.uk
